answers.answer: Ugh Im sorry that blows, I chose the lemon lime(not sure if u had the choice) with my first bc my sister in law said the orange was horrible and she threw it up and had to get re tested again. Hopefully your test comes back good!
I'm hoping it does come back normal. Diabetes runs in my family on my dads side and it can go either way but I'm hoping I'm okay.
I didn't have a choice I had the orange what was lemon lime like?
I had mine Friday I know how u felt about the taste  I had lemon lime it tasted ok but made me sick to my stomach I didn't black out but felt sick .. I hope everything comes out good!
It tasted like a flat thick sprite kinda, my sister in law chose that flavor the next time and didn't throw that one up lol
I think I blacked out because I was soo tired and hungry. I didn't sleep well last night baby kicks keeps me up. Thanks :) lemon lime sounds better I'm kinda jealous lol

question: I drank that orange drink and immediately wanted to throw up. I felt terrible. After my blood was drawn I had to lay down because I started over heating and nearly passed out. When I drove home I blacked out scared the **** out of me lol. But I was told my prior sugar levels were good so I'm hoping I will be okay
title: 1 hour glucose test
